CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 13, 1946, pg. 17 reads: "Kiddie Party - The Fourth of July was a double treat to John Nelson Jr., who was...years old. A number of his tot friends attended a birthday party in his honor at his home at 2224 Tustin Street.  His father, John Sr., will soon be home from serving with the armed forces in South Pacific. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Five boys and seven girls standing behind John Nelson Jr. with birthday cake, eating icing off of knife, in Nelson's home on 2224 Tustin Street
